sentence: Today the Federal Open Market Committee decided to raise the target range for the federal funds rate by ¼ percentage point, bringing it to ½ to ¾ percent.

sentence: In doing so, my colleagues and I are recognizing the considerable progress the economy has made toward our dual objectives of maximum employment and price stability.

sentence: Over the past year, 2 ¼ million net new jobs have been created, unemployment has fallen fu rther, and inflation has moved closer to our longer -run goal of 2 percent.

sentence: Broader measures of labor market slack have also moved lower, and participation in the labor force has been little changed, on net, for about t wo years now, a further sign of improved conditions in the labor market given the underlying downward trend in participation  December 14, 2016  Chair Yellen’s Press Conference  FINAL  Page 2 of 20   stemming largely from the aging of the U.S. population.

sentence: Turning to inflation, the 12- month change in the price index for personal consumption expenditures was nearly 1 ½ percent in October, still short of our 2 percent objective but up more than a percentage point from a year earlier.

sentence: Our inflation outlook rests importantly on our judgment that longer -run inflation expectations remain reasonably well anchored.
